text: Fierce Creatures is a 1997 British comedy movie. The movie was written by John Cleese and directed by Fred Schepisi and Robert Young. The story is based around a British zoo. It has recently been bought by New Zealand businessman Rod McCain (played by Kevin Kline) and put under the management of Rollo Lee (Cleese). In order to gain more money, Lee decides to use a "fierce creatures" policy. This means that only animals which could kill people would be kept in the zoo. The movie was a Spiritual sequel to A Fish Called Wanda and used the same main cast. ==Cast== * John Cleese as Rollo Lee * Jamie Lee Curtis as Willa Weston * Kevin Kline as Vince McCain/Rod McCain * Michael Palin as Adrian 'Bugsy' Malone * Robert Lindsay as Sydney Lotterby * Ronnie Corbett as Reggie Sea Lions * Carey Lowell as Cub Felines * Bille Brown as Neville * Derek Griffiths as Garry Ungulates * Cynthia Cleese as Pip Small Mammals * Richard Ridings as Hugh Primates * Maria Aitken as Di Harding ==Other websites== * Category:1997 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Fred Schepisi Category:Movies directed by Robert Young
